posts.post_content:
I am looking for a T204 Ramly card of Chief Bender, raw or graded VG/Ex or better. I have a nice looking T204 Huggins PSA 3(due to back stains) that I would trade or trade plus cash for higher grade cards. I am also buying all other T204 Ramly's Ex or better Raw or graded.
